game.name: Panzer Deck
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Panzer Deck is a tactical card-based war game. Deploy resources to recruit units and equipment. Use maneuver cards to reposition forces, maximize their potential, and synergize units for powerful combos. Secure victory on WWII’s Western Front battlefields.
